news.title: 曼迪·摩尔夫妇在洛杉矶山火后重建梦想家园
news.title0: Mandy Moore and Taylor Goldsmith nearly lost their dream home in the LA fires. Here’s how they rebuilt
news.content: 美国演员曼迪·摩尔夫妇的加州梦想家园在去年洛杉矶山火中严重受损，目前他们正与家人一起重建并重新装修这栋历史住宅。
news.content0: In 2020, Mandy Moore and her musician husband Taylor Goldsmith bought their dream home in Altadena, California, as a family of two, hiring a team to begin renovating the romantic Spanish Colonial Revival property and update its 1930s charm. In 2023, as a family of four, with another baby on the way, they moved in and began living their new life in Altadena’s enclave of historic architecture, mountain views and small-town charm.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 探访被遗忘的1700年巨型建筑遗迹
news.content: 斯里兰卡的杰塔瓦纳拉玛寺是一座建于公元四世纪的巨型砖砌佛塔，曾是世界上最大的建筑之一，历经地震与战火幸存至今。
news.content0: In our roundup of travel stories this week: a man recreates his father’s round-the-world bicycle trip, a luxury yacht that turned out to be a mold-covered wreck, plus the ancient Roman city 10 times the size of Disneyland.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 古驰发布AI生成图，引发奢侈品与科技融合争议
news.content: 古驰在新系列时装秀前发布了一系列AI生成的宣传图片，展示了浮夸的财富场景，此举在社交媒体上引发广泛讨论与争议。
news.content0: Backstage at the runway debut of the newnewGucci – the third rebrand that the luxury titan has undergone since Alessandro Michele left in 2022 – designer Demna was feeling the amore. “I hope I made you feel Gucci today,” he said. “The energy, the passion, the fun, the sexy…. I feel like I’m falling in love with this feeling I cannot really understand.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美国东北部遭历史性暴风雪袭击，交通电力中断
news.title0: Power outages, travel troubles and bitter cold plague Northeast in wake of historic bomb cyclone blizzard
news.content: 一场历史性的“炸弹气旋”暴风雪袭击美国东北部，多地降雪超两英尺，导致大面积停电、交通瘫痪，数千航班取消。
news.content0: Thousands in the Northeast remained without power amid freezing temperatures Tuesday as people from that region and the mid-Atlantic dug out from extreme snowfall — including more than 2 feet in several states — from the previous two days and faced continuing travel disruptions including hundreds of canceled flights.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿美元奥运主场馆设计引争议
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计方案，这座耗资23亿美元、灵感源于当地住宅的建筑计划在遗产公园内兴建，引发环保争议。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 揭秘被遗忘的“猫头鹰俱乐部”：首支黑人女子职业垒球冠军队
news.title0: Unearthing the forgotten diamonds: The untold story of the Owls Club
news.content: 1938年，西雅图的“猫头鹰俱乐部”赢得了首届黑人女子职业垒球锦标赛冠军，这支由杰出黑人女性组成的队伍的故事几乎被历史遗忘。
news.content0: In 1938, the Owls Club, a group of talented Black women inSeattle, Washington, won the first-ever Black women’s professional softball championship.
news.author: CNN

news.title: OpenAI与五角大楼达成AI军事应用协议
news.title0: OpenAI strikes deal with Pentagon hours after Trump admin bans Anthropic
news.content: 在特朗普政府禁止联邦机构使用Anthropic的AI技术数小时后，OpenAI宣布与五角大楼达成协议，其AI工具将用于美军机密系统。
news.content0: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman announced late Friday that the company had signeda deal with the Pentagonfor its AI toolsto be used in the military’s classified systems, but with seemingly similar guardrails rival Anthropic had also requested.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 金正恩携女持狙击步枪亮相，强化其女接班人形象
news.title0: With sniper rifle photos, Kim Jong Un intensifies spotlight on his daughter, a potential successor
news.content: 朝鲜发布金正恩与其 teenage 女儿在射击场的照片，女孩持狙击步枪射击。这是朝媒最新一次宣传这位被外界视为潜在接班人的年轻女性。
news.content0: North Korea on Saturday released pictures showing leader Kim Jong Un and his teenage daughter at a rifle range, the latest propaganda images to promote the child touted as a potential successor.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美公民在古巴海域枪战中身亡，美古关系紧张
news.title0: US citizen was among those killed in Cuba speedboat shootout. Here’s what we know
news.content: 古巴军方称击毙四名试图“渗透”该岛的武装人员，其中一人为美国公民。事件导致美古关系紧张，双方均已展开调查。
news.content0: Cuba’s forces fatally shot four people, one of whom was a US citizen, on a Florida-registered speedboat that was trying to enter Cuban waters Wednesday and “infiltrate” the island, authorities said.
news.author: CNN
